name: Exobots
public_notice: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Meet Exobots: Omens of Steel, the new NFT game for Android/iOS, PC and MacOS where you can fight with your own robot squad to forge your legend in Metron City. Enjoy the wide and rich experience the game offers through its different features, such as Adventure, Battle, Crafting, Merge… and Earn!”
